    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move()
        Player's Move Method: Checks if player is inbound and not driving so he can move a certain amount in the vertical and horizontal directions. Checks player's direction and sets a moving motion based on it.

      • setDriving

        public void setDriving(boolean driving)
        If the player is driving, his representation is not updated
        Parameters:
        driving -

      • shoot

        public Bullet shoot()
        Player's shoot method: Checks if player has a weapon, bullets and if the mouse was clicked. If so, depending on the direction the player is facing, he will be able to shoot 180 degrees to his front.
        Returns:

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Reload Method: Checks if player has weapon, usable ammo and if the reload command was executed. If so, replenishes all the bullets and discounts one ammo slot.

        public void resetEntry()
